title: Mens et Manus Linguistics podcast Episode 1 - Noam Chomsky
description:
Discussion on Language AI and Linguistics 

Some of the questions we will be exploring-

1. Is strong AI possible? 
2. Turing's Imitation Game or Searle's Chinese Room
3. Is there more to Language Understanding than formal procedures?
4. Theory of Generative Syntax and Knowledge of Language
5. Notion of Semantics in AI models
6. Primacy of Syntax
7. Role of linguistics in the current AI age
